statements: SELECT * FROM CourtRulings
SELECT ruling_id, case_number FROM CourtRulings WHERE reproductive_rights = TRUE
SELECT court_name, date_of_ruling FROM CourtRulings ORDER BY date_of_ruling DESC
SELECT * FROM CourtRulings WHERE healthcare_access = FALSE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ruling_count FROM CourtRulings
SELECT * FROM CourtRulings WHERE reproductive_rights = TRUE AND healthcare_access = TRUE;
SELECT case_number, court_name FROM CourtRulings WHERE date_of_ruling >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_ruling DESC;
SELECT * FROM CourtRulings WHERE court_name LIKE '%Supreme%' ORDER BY ruling_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ruling_id, case_number, date_of_ruling FROM CourtRulings WHERE reproductive_rights = TRUE AND healthcare_access = FALSE;
SELECT court_name, COUNT(*) as total_rulings FROM CourtRulings GROUP BY court_name HAVING total_rulings > 3 ORDER BY total_rulings DESC;
SELECT * FROM CourtRulings;
SELECT case_name, court_name, ruling_date FROM CourtRulings ORDER BY ruling_date DESC;
SELECT topic, decision FROM CourtRulings WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT case_name, COURT_NAME, UPPER(decision) FROM CourtRulings WHERE case_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM LegalTrends WHERE end_year < 2020 ORDER BY start_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM CourtRulings WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court' ORDER BY ruling_date DESC
SELECT case_name, topic FROM CourtRulings WHERE ruling_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CourtRulings WHERE decision = 'Valid' AND topic LIKE '%criminal%'
SELECT court_name, COUNT(*) AS cases_count FROM CourtRulings GROUP BY court_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT court_name, AVG(end_year - start_year) AS avg_duration FROM LegalTrends GROUP BY court_name ORDER BY avg_duration DESC
SELECT * FROM court_rulings ORDER BY ruling_date DESC;
SELECT plaintiff, defendant, court_name FROM court_rulings WHERE issue = 'Land Dispute';
SELECT * FROM legal_trends WHERE start_year >= 2010 AND end_year <= 2020;
SELECT service_name, cost FROM healthcare_services WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT service_name, provider_name, service_type FROM healthcare_services ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM court_rulings ORDER BY ruling_date DESC, case_id;
SELECT plaintiff, defendant, court_name FROM court_rulings WHERE plaintiff='John Doe' AND defendant='Jane Doe';
SELECT trend_name, start_year, end_year FROM legal_trends WHERE start_year >= 2010 AND end_year <= 2020;
SELECT service_name, service_type, provider_name FROM healthcare_services WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM court_rulings WHERE court_name='Supreme Court' OR court_name='District Court';
SELECT * FROM rulings;
SELECT case_name, court_name, ruling_date FROM rulings WHERE plaintiff='John Doe';
SELECT law_name, jurisdiction, enactment_date FROM laws ORDER BY enactment_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date, description FROM trends WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT category, COUNT(*) as count FROM statistics GROUP BY category ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM rulings WHERE plaintiff='John Doe';
SELECT case_name, court_name, ruling_date FROM rulings ORDER BY ruling_date DESC;
SELECT law_name, jurisdiction FROM laws WHERE enactment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT count(*) AS total_cases FROM rulings WHERE defendant='Jane Smith';
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM trends WHERE description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT * FROM CourtCases;
SELECT case_name, court_name FROM CourtCases WHERE case_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT case_name, case_outcome FROM CourtCases WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT plaintiff_name, plaintiff_gender FROM Plaintiffs;
SELECT defendant_name, defendant_role FROM Defendants ORDER BY defendant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CourtCases;
SELECT case_name, court_name, case_date FROM CourtCases WHERE case_outcome = 'Guilty';
SELECT defendant_id, defendant_name, defendant_role FROM Defendants ORDER BY defendant_name DESC;
SELECT plaintiff_name, plaintiff_gender, plaintiff_age FROM Plaintiffs WHERE plaintiff_age > 30;
SELECT team_name, attorney_1, attorney_2 FROM LegalTeams WHERE attorney_1 IS NOT NULL;
